title: Textile, 1951
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: #630 STACCATO by angelo testa (printed in selvedge)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Length of printed cotton with narrow horizontal stripes alternating with line-drawn squares of various sizes spaced irregularly across the width of the fabric. Design reserved in natural on a printed dark steel blue ground.
